# Invariants: opencode-codex.ts

## Core Invariants


## Constraints
- **OPENCODE_CODEX_URL**: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anomalyco/opencode/dev/packages/opencode/src/session/prompt/codex.txt"
- **CACHE_DIR**: join(homedir(), ".opencode", "cache")
- **CACHE_FILE**: join(CACHE_DIR, "opencode-codex.txt")
- **CACHE_META_FILE**: join(CACHE_DIR, "opencode-codex-meta.json")
- **CACHE_TTL_MS**: 15 * 60 * 1000
